version_description:
+ Improve UI
+ Support all deep links
+ Proper Wallet for un/protected users

+ Improve UX
+ Multiple countries

+ Country selection is remembered
+ Fix crashing problems on older iOS versions
+ Minor bugs fixes

+ Update locales
+ Minor improvements

+ Minor Improvements
+ Errors reporting

+ Improve push notification experience.
+ Minor bugs fixed

+ Major bugs fixed.
+ New sidebar menu.
+ Improve errors handling.

Thanks for using Remitano! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

Every update of our Remitano app includes improvements for speed and reliability. As new features become available, we’ll highlight those for you in the app.
